elements.title: flag of Mauritania (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the red bands on the flag of Mauritania (pictured) were added in 2017 to represent the blood shed for the country's independence from France?

elements.title: 1939 Salvadoran presidential election (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that, according to the ruling party, the citizenry overwhelmingly allowed the president to be re-elected in the 1939 Salvadoran presidential election?

elements.title: Fukura P (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the wedding ceremony of Fukura P and Kazumi Takayama was held at the Tokyo Metropolitan Government Building?

elements.title: Kızılırmak Delta (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that three-quarters of Turkey's bird species live in the Kızılırmak Delta?

elements.title: Adamsochrysa (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Adamsochrysa fossils from British Columbia and Washington are most similar to an Australian green lacewing?

elements.title: Beauty and the Bester (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that doctor Nandipha Magudumana received payment for the use of her archives in the Netflix documentary Beauty and the Bester, which she subsequently attempted to prevent from being aired?

elements.title: Fontaine (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the music of Fontaine in Genshin Impact was performed by the London Symphony Orchestra?

elements.title: Barbara Buczek (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Barbara Buczek intentionally composed music so intricate that it was nearly impossible to realise all of its details?

elements.title: The Exit 8 (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that fans of The Exit 8 travelled from across the world to visit a Japanese subway station?

elements.title: Destination of the Month (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Destination of the Month

Parahyangan

The West Javanese region centred around Java's third largest city of Bandung is an excellent place to hike and admire active volcanoes.

elements.title: Off the Beaten Path (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Off the Beaten Path

Sekigahara

This quaint mountain town and battlefield, where Tokugawa won control of Japan, gives visitors firsthand insight into feudal Japanese warfare.

elements.title: Featured Travel Topic (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Featured Travel Topic

Driving in China

China isn't one of the countries that foreigners commonly explore by driving themselves. If you'd still like to, the first step would be getting a local driving licence.
